title: Capeta
synopsis: After losing his mother at a very young age, elementary school student Capeta Taira is forced to become more independent to avoid his father worrying for him. Working in a paving company, his father is often busy and has to work overtime to make ends meet. However, no matter how tough he acts in front of his father, Capeta is ultimately just a lonely kid with a rough life. In addition to his typical house duties, he has to deal with the bully Nobu Andou which makes him feel worse, despite support from his classmate, Monami Suzuki.
characters: ['Taira, Capeta', 'Minamoto, Naomi', 'Suzuki, Monami', 'Andou, Nobu', 'Minamoto, Nanako', 'Noriko, Hata', 'Taira, Shigeo']
